thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn New York/Manhattan-Midtown East - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Consistent with a helpful staff and good value
thread.title_full: Consistent with a helpful staff and good value - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Manhattan-Midtown East, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: MJP-ATL
title: Consistent with a helpful staff and good value
text: Always a pleasant experience. Rooms are not large, but comfortable, breakfast is very good, staff is extremely friendly and helpful. Housekeeping does an excellent job. Elevators can run a little slow in peak hours. No great views, but upper floors are more quiet. Great location. Great value.
